name: Office Arcade Idle
summary:
Welcome to Office Tycoon VR!

Get ready to revolutionize the office experience in virtual reality! Dive into the captivating world of corporate management where you build, expand, and manage your very own office empire.

Features:

Immersive VR Gameplay: Step into a vibrant virtual world where you're the boss! Use VR controls to interact with your office, manage resources, and optimize productivity.

Build Your Dream Office: Start small and expand your office space. Customize layouts, add departments,...
